data.actual_result: Welcome system message is the only one that allows quick mentionning people
data.expected_result: It should be consistent and either allow Quick Mentions on all system messages or disable for all
data.short_description: Inconsistency about Quick Mention feature on system messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a system message that welcomes a user - Tap on the user's name in the message - Notice that a mention is inserted in the chat box - Now do the same but for a system message saying that a message was pinned - Notice it does nothing
